historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-1244.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 5202(b) of Fiscal Year 2005 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-486, August 2, 2004, 51 DCR 8236).

For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 5202(b) of Fiscal Year 2005 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-594, October 26, 2004, 51 DCR 11725).

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-52, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1241.

For Law 15-205, see notes following § 47-1241.

DC CODE § 47-1244
